description: Try our easy to follow Indian-Spiced Pumpkin Soup With Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Indian-Spiced Pumpkin Soup With Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup coconut cream (save 0.5 cup to serve)
16 green prawns, peeled, deveined, tails intact

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic and ginger and cook for 5 minutes or until onion starts to brown. Add curry paste and cook for a further 2 minutes or until fragrant.

Stir in pumpkin and potato and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring often, for 5 minutes. Add 3 cups water and coconut cream and simmer for 20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. pur√©e soup until smooth.
Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add prawns, chilli and coriander. Season with salt and pepper and cook for 2-3 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until golden.
Ladle soup into bowls and top with extra coconut cream and prawns.
